readDate(String) - Method in class prj1.TXTEditor.StandardInputRead
It reads an date in the form dd/mm/yyyy from standard input and returns it as value.In case of an error it returns null

Method that reads bytes(from the disk) and converts them into tuples
readNegativeFloat(String) - Method in class prj1.TXTEditor.StandardInputRead

readPositiveFloat(String) - Method in class prj1.TXTEditor.StandardInputRead
It reads an positive float, zero included, from standard input and returns it as value.
readPositiveInt(String) - Method in class prj1.TXTEditor.StandardInputRead
It reads an positive integer, zero included, from standard input and returns it as value.
readString(String) - Method in class prj1.TXTEditor.StandardInputRead
It reads a string from standard inputand returns it as value.
readTime(String) - Method in class prj1.TXTEditor.StandardInputRead
It reads an time in the form h:mm AM or PM from standard input and returns it as value.In case of an error it returns null Example of valid times: 8:30 AM, 2:00 PM, etc
resetCounter() - Method in class prj1.CounterSingleton.CounterSingleton
Resets the internal counter to zero
